mapper.update: update hm_erp_venue set base_id = #{baseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, venue_name = #{venueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, venue_type = #{venueType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, venue_phone = #{venuePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, respo = #{respo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, venue_status = #{venueStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, base_id, venue_name, venue_type, venue_phone, respo, address, venue_status, company_id from hm_erp_venue where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
